message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,400,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $1,200,000 to $1,300,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,250,000 is a bit too low for me to consider.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $1,325,000?  This product is truly exceptional and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I understand your position, Alice. While I respect the value of the product, I must stick to my budget. Could we possibly negotiate down to $1,275,000?
